headline: Bloomberg 500 (B500) Index Adds Sixteen Securities Following Semi-Annual Reconstitution
summary: Bloomberg Indices announced the following changes to the Bloomberg 500 (B500) Index effective prior to the open of trading on Thursday, September 11, to coincide with the semi-annual reconstitution of the index. The B500 contains the 500 most highly capitalized US companies weighted by float market cap, reflecting a market capitalization of $58.19 trillion.

headline: Can Eos Energy Enterprises (EOSE) Translate New Leadership Into Lasting Manufacturing Resilience?
summary: Earlier this month, Eos Energy Enterprises appointed John Mahaz as Chief Operating Officer, bringing with him nearly four decades of global manufacturing leadership and a strong track record, including recent operational oversight at Jabil where he managed over 70,000 employees and more than US$14 billion in annual revenue. Mahaz’s experience in rebuilding manufacturing infrastructure, such as restoring critical production capacity in Puerto Rico after Hurricane Maria, signals a significant...
